prompt: Create a sleek and modern login form interface with a light theme and a professional aesthetic. The UI should be centered on the screen with a single-column layout. The background should be a pure white color (Colors.white). At the top, display a bold 'Sign In' heading in a large font size (32px) using a deep navy color (Colors.blue[900]). Below the heading, add a subtitle 'Access your account securely' in a smaller font size (16px) with a medium gray color (Colors.grey[600]). Include two input fields: an email TextField with a rounded border (BorderRadius.circular(10)), a light gray border (Colors.grey[300]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email Address' label, and a hint text 'Enter your email'. The password TextField should have similar styling but with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Enter your password', and a toggleable visibility icon (Icons.visibility/Icons.visibility_off). Both fields should have a focused border in navy (Colors.blue[900]). Add a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in a vibrant blue (Colors.blue[700]) with a font size of 14px. Below, include a full-width elevated button for login with a navy background (Colors.blue[900]), white text, rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(10)), and a subtle elevation (elevation: 3). At the bottom, include a row with the text 'New here?' in gray (Colors.grey[600]) followed by a 'Create Account' link in vibrant blue (Colors.blue[700]). Apply consistent padding of 32 pixels around the main content and 16 pixels between elements. The form container should have a subtle shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.grey[200], blurRadius 12, offset (0, 4)) and a white background with rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(16)). Ensure the layout is responsive and scrolls if needed.
